name: Luwe OS
short_description: Luwe OS is based on the idea of ​​web OS that is using web applications wherever possible and convenient to the application on the local disk. The system is based on the Lubuntu 11.04 or Ubuntu with LXDE. By using LXDE, the system has little requirements and aesthetic appearance. Use autoukrywalnego side panel allows you to use the whole screen to work which is particularly important in netbooks with small displays. The system is integrated with the IM (Pidgin) and Dropbox application which allows to synchronize between computers.
